typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'sqldbauditlogs',
	folderPath: 'loans/input',
	fileName: 'Loan payments data.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> largefile
largefile sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'sqldbauditlogs',
	folderPath: 'loans',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	filePattern:'loan_[n]',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> multismalfiles
